basics.name: Mercedez Castro
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2020.

highlights: Efficiently organized financial records by preparing monthly financial expense and income reports
Maintained a loyal client base and established positive and professional relationships with guests to form trust and arrange appointments to ensure maximum satisfaction
Worked under a Medical Doctor and Registered Nurses to implement quality standards and provide proficient oversight to the entire daily operation of the medical spa
Interviewed, trained, and supervised all employees in regards to company procedures, services, and products to execute outstanding results in creating a positive and encouraging working environment

Conducted inventory to track sales trend statistics and shrinkage, ensured ordering of all supplies and products, and worked collaboratively with sales reps to promote and boost revenue and client retention
Responsible for planning employee schedules, company meetings, client events, and enforcing company policies and procedures
Provided technical support and was responsible for troubleshooting computer, software, and network issues

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: The Dean's List requires students to have completed 6 or more credits for a letter grade achieving a grade point average of at least 3.6 for the semester, a cumulative grade point ratio of 3.0, and no N’s, I’s, or F’s, and a maximum of one W in the semester of eligibility.
